## ExportConstants interface

A set of [exported constants](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/policies/variables#export-constants) to be reused in other policies.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ExportConstants extends PolicyBase 
```
**Extends:** [PolicyBase](./core.policybase.md)

## Remarks

Requires the Cerbos policy decision point server to be at least v0.40.
